name: One Voice
description:
OneVoice is a top-down shooter game about classroom justice.

Wade through hordes of belligerent year 7s to dish out C1s or clear the room with a chunky C3. Eventually, the classroom is quiet, but outside you hear a muttering and mumbling. "Uhhh, I don't remember saying the one voice policy was over, screens off face me". You head outside to face the crowd, demolishing a playground full of chavs.

Made in 2 weeks.
